programme.desc: A beautiful doctor (Sarita Choudhury) and a wise-cracking taxi driver (Alexander Black) help an American businessman (Tom Hanks) who's trying to close the deal of a lifetime in Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges every 27 years to prey on children. Banding together, the friends must overcome their personal fears to battle the murderous clown Pennywise.

programme.title: It: Chapter Two
programme.desc: Defeated by members of the Losers' Club, the evil clown Pennywise returns 27 years later to terrorize the town of Derry, Maine. Now adults, the united Losers must conquer their deepest fears to destroy the shape-shifting Pennywise once and for all.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: A New York bookie (Robert De Niro) and his pal (Joe Pesci) turn a Las Vegas casino into an empire, then one's money-hungry wife (Sharon Stone) helps bring it down.

programme.title: Queer
programme.desc: Lee, a solitary American in Mexico City, falls for a beautiful, elusive former soldier. Journeying together into the jungle, Lee sees, for the first time, the possibility of an intimate and infinite love.

programme.title: Elevation
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic survivors find refuge in the Rocky Mountains to hide from giant, insect-like creatures that can't live above 8,000 feet. However, when one of them needs life-saving supplies, they risk it all to venture into the danger zone.

programme.title: Nobody Walks
programme.desc: A young woman's (Olivia Thirlby) arrival sparks a surge of energy into a laid-back, artistic Los Angeles household, forcing the residents to confront their own fears and desires in an intricate dance of lust, denial and deception.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: After leaving her all-female island for the first time, Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot) discovers her full powers and true destiny while fighting alongside men in a war to end all wars.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Wonder Woman musters all of her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A thief (Leonardo DiCaprio) who enters people's dreams and steals their secrets gets a shot at redemption when he is given the dangerous task of planting an idea in someone's subconscious.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: A descendant of the mysterious secret society known as the Assassins uses his newfound knowledge and physical skills to battle the power-hungry Templar Order.

programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: An evil spreads in 1956 France as a priest is murdered and Sister Irene once again comes face-to-face with the demonic nun Valak.

programme.title: Scanners
programme.desc: A scientist (Patrick McGoohan) sends a "scanner" (Stephen Lack) to hunt others like him with explosive psychic powers.

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: A young man (Miles Teller) and his girlfriend (Anna Kendrick) struggle to find desirable employment after graduating from college.

programme.title: The Family Meeting
programme.desc: A Christmas family meeting forces a Nigerian grandmother and granddaughter to face their fears about growing old and growing up.

programme.title: Pens & Pencils
programme.desc: A high school teacher embarks on a wild-goose chase to find a missing student that no one else seems to miss.

programme.title: Cracked
programme.desc: A feisty, young girl named Toya falls in love for the first time, but a series of disturbing events forces her to face her traumatic past.

programme.title: User Zero
programme.desc: A passionate neuroscientist must save her patients from her own invention before losing her mind.

programme.title: Mountainhead
programme.desc: Four friends reunite during worldwide economic turmoil.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Four couples find that paradise comes at a price when they must participate in therapy sessions at a tropical resort.

programme.title: David Holmes: The Boy Who Lived
programme.desc: David Holmes develops an inextricable bond with actor Daniel Radcliffe while playing his stunt double in the "Harry Potter" films, but an accident on set leaves David paralyzed.

programme.title: Life as We Know It
programme.desc: Two career-driven acquaintances (Katherine Heigl, Josh Duhamel) must put aside their mutual dislike and learn to work together to raise their orphaned goddaughter.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy company's annual gala in a high-rise building. It's now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in. As the diabolical guest tries to get her claws on the child, Belinda must draw the line somewhere.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: A resourceful teen takes her younger sister's place in a brutal contest in which youths from each of 12 districts fight to the death on live television.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: After their unprecedented victory in the 74th Hunger Games, Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark embark on a Victors Tour. Katniss senses rebellion is stirring, but a cruel change in the upcoming 75th Hunger Games may change Panem forever.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 1
programme.desc: After shattering the games forever, Katniss (Jennifer Lawrence) finds herself in District 13, fighting to save Peeta (Josh Hutcherson) and a nation moved by her courage.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 2
programme.desc: Katniss faces mortal traps, deadly enemies and moral choices when she and her closest friends leave District 13 to assassinate President Snow and liberate the citizens of war-torn Panem.

programme.title: Babygirl
programme.desc: A high-powered CEO puts her career and family on the line when she begins a torrid affair with her much younger intern.

programme.title: Skiptrace
programme.desc: A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle a Chinese criminal.

programme.desc: In this series, six filmmakers adapt classic movies through a contemporary lens, tackling modern-day issues surrounding identity.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man (Justin Timberlake) must figure out how to bring down a system where time is money, enabling the wealthy to live forever, while the poor must beg for each minute of life.

programme.desc: A man is imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose in staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.
